Monologue.Current: // Перед отправлением в Тимбер{Line}Преподаватель{Line}“Ждём ещё минуту...”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“...One more minute...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Я тут!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Made it!”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“На территории сада т-борды запрещены.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“T-Boards are prohibited within Garden.{Line} Have you forgotten?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Упс, прошу пардону!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Oops, sorry!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Но эта штука и вправду классная.{Line} Однажды, она может пригодиться{Line} и на задании для сидов!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“But this is really cool.{Line} It may come in handy on a{Line} SeeD mission, someday.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Об этом уже судить нам.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“We’ll be the judges of that.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Конфисковать.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Confiscate it.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Все вы - сиды, но...”{Next}“Пока вы находитесь в этом саду,{Line} вы остаётесь нашими студентами.”{Next}“И раз уж вы сиды, то должны подавать{Line} пример остальным, соблюдая правила.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“All of you are members of SeeD, but...”{Next}“Nevertheless, you’re still{Line} students at this Garden.”{Next}“Furthermore, because you are SeeDs,{Line} you must set an example to all others{Line} and abide by the Garden’s rules.”{Next}“Understood!?”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Что ж, о вашем задании...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, about your first mission...”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Вы отправитесь в {Term Timber}.”{Next}“И окажите поддержку{Line} группе сопротивления.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You are to{Line} go to {Term Timber}.”{Next}“There, you will be supporting a resistance{Line} faction. That is your mission.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Один из них встретит вас в Тимбере{Line} на железнодорожной станции.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“A member of the faction will{Line} contact you at {Term Timber} Station.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Этот человек заговорит с вами и скажет:{Line} «Тимберские леса изменились».”{Next}“Вы должны ответить:{Line} «Но совы ещё остались».{Line} Это пароль.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“This person will talk to you and say,{Line} ‘The forests of {Term Timber} sure have changed’.”{Next}“At this time, you must reply,{Line} ‘But the owls are still around’.”{Next}“That is the password.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Далее следуйте их приказам.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Just follow the faction’s orders.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Эээ... только мы втроём?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Uh... Just us 3?”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Верно. Мы согласились выполнить это{Line} задание за очень скромную сумму.”{Next}“Обычно, мы не принимаем подобных{Line} запросов, но...”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Correct. We have agreed to do{Line} this mission for very little money.”{Next}“Normally, we would never{Line} accept such requests, but...”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Довольно об этом.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Enough talk about that.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“{Char Squall}, ты - лидер отряда.{Line} Принимай решения согласно ситуации.”{Next}“{Char Zell} и {Char Selphie}, вы должны{Line} оказать поддержку своему лидеру и{Line} сделать всё возможное для осуществления{Line} планов группы сопротивления.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well then, {Char Squall}, you are the{Line} squad leader. Use your best{Line} judgement based on the situation.”{Next}“Zell and Selphie, you are to support{Line} {Char Squall} and give your all to carry out{Line} the faction’s plans.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“О, {Char Squall}...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Oh, and {Char Squall}...”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Возьми ещё это...”{Next}“Это проклятая штуковина.{Line} Но она может оказать помощь.” {Next}“Используй её, когда будешь{Line} уверен в своих силах.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I forgot to give you this.”{Next}“It’s a cursed item,{Line} but if one with power uses it,{Line} it should be of great help.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Возьми ещё это...”{Next}“Это проклятая штуковина.{Line} Но она может оказать помощь.”{Next}“Используй её, когда будешь{Line} уверен в своих силах.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Oh, and {Char Squall},{Line} I forgot to give you this.”{Next}“It’s a cursed item,{Line} but if one with enough power uses it,{Line} it should be of great help.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Any questions?”{Next}How long is this mission supposed to last?{Line}What was the password again?{Line}...Not really
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Any questions?”{Next}How long is this mission supposed to last?{Line}What was the password again?{Line}...Not really

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That would depend on the other party.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That would depend on the other party.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“They will say,{Line} ‘The forests of {Term Timber} sure have changed.’”{Next}“You must answer,{Line} ‘But the owls are still around.’”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“They will say,{Line} ‘The forests of {Term Timber} sure have changed.’”{Next}“You must answer,{Line} ‘But the owls are still around.’”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hahaha...{Line} You’re beginning to worry me...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hahaha...{Line} You’re beginning to worry me...”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Удачи вам.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Best of luck on your first mission.”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“Пароль: «Но совы ещё остались».{Line} Не забудь.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Once again, the password is,{Line} ‘But the owls are still around.’{Line} Don’t forget.”

Monologue.Current: Получена [Волшебная лампа]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Magical Lamp]!

Monologue.Current: (What the hell is going on?)
Monologue.Original: (What the hell is going on?)

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“You three, which side are you on?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“You three, which side are you on?”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Answer the question! Are you with the{Line} Garden Master, or are you with Cid!?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Answer the question! Are you with the{Line} Garden Master, or are you with Cid!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I don’t understand what{Line} you’re talking about.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I don’t understand what{Line} you’re talking about.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Do you swear your allegiance{Line} to Garden Master NORG?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Do you swear your allegiance{Line} to Garden Master NORG?”

Monologue.Current: (...I guess...for now){Line}(...I don’t get it)
Monologue.Original: (...I guess...for now){Line}(...I don’t get it)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes...{Line} We do...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes...{Line} We do...”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“All right then.{Line} Go find Cid.”{Next}“Members of his faction are protecting{Line} him. Kill them if they interfere.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“All right then.{Line} Go find Cid.”{Next}“Members of his faction are protecting{Line} him. Kill them if they interfere.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“What are you waiting for? Go!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“What are you waiting for? Go!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Can you tell me what’s going on?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Can you tell me what’s going on?”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“I’m the one asking the questions!{Line} You’re just supposed to follow orders!”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“I’m the one asking the questions!{Line} You’re just supposed to follow orders!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Hey! What kind of attitude is that!?{Line} You’re with Cid, aren’t you!?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Hey! What kind of attitude is that!?{Line} You’re with Cid, aren’t you!?”

Monologue.Current: “Прекрасный бриз,{Line} великолепная погода...{Line} Что ещё нужно для счастья?”
Monologue.Original: “Nice breeze, beautiful sun...{Line} I think I’ll just...”

Monologue.Current: “(Кажется, он спит...)”
Monologue.Original: “Zzzz...”

Monologue.Current: “Наверное, нужно съездить домой{Line} в эти выходные. Давно предков{Line} не навещал...”
Monologue.Original: “Perhaps I should go home this weekend.{Line} I really should go visit my parents.”

Monologue.Current: “Так, девки, что мы{Line} сегодня будем смотреть?..”
Monologue.Original: “By the way... About the{Line} movie we want to go see...”

Monologue.Current: “Мне всё равно.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, I’ll watch anything.”

Monologue.Current: “Я хочу на боевик!”
Monologue.Original: “I wanna see an{Line} action movie!”

Monologue.Current: “Ни за что! Уже был один{Line} на прошлой неделе!”
Monologue.Original: “No way!{Line} We just saw one last week.”

Monologue.Current: “Я за комедию!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m up for a{Line} comedy today.”

Monologue.Current: “Или как насчёт того фильма{Line} про рыцаря и волшебницу?”
Monologue.Original: “Or how ’bout that movie{Line} about the sorceress and the knight!?”

Monologue.Current: “О, ты про ремейк?”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, you mean that remake?”

Monologue.Current: “А я не смотрела ни ремейк,{Line} ни оригинал...”
Monologue.Original: “I’ve never actually{Line} sat through the whole movie.”

Monologue.Current: “Он потрясный!..”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, that one...”

Monologue.Current: “Звучит заманчиво!”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, yeah! That sounds good!”

Monologue.Current: “Отлично, тогда решено!”
Monologue.Original: “Alright, it’s decided then!”

Monologue.Current: “Есть хочется...{Line} Может, зайдём куда-нибудь?”
Monologue.Original: “I’m kinda hungry.{Line} Wanna grab somethin’ to eat?”

Monologue.Current: “Ага, поддерживаю!”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah, sure!”

Monologue.Current: “Ммм... а куда?”
Monologue.Original: “Umm...{Line} Where should we go?”

Monologue.Current: “Как насчёт...”
Monologue.Original: “How about...”

Monologue.Current: “...той новой кафэшке{Line} с симпатичными оффициантиками?”
Monologue.Original: “What about that{Line} new place where they{Line} serve that sweet stuff?”

Monologue.Current: “Я за!”
Monologue.Original: “Sounds good to me!”

Monologue.Current: “Согласна!..{Line} Эх, прощай моя диета...”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah...!{Line} But that means I have to{Line} quit my diet again...”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, вернёшься к ней завтра.”
Monologue.Original: “Well, just start{Line} again tomorrow.”

Monologue.Current: “Ага, в который раз...”
Monologue.Original: “That’s what{Line} always happens...”

Monologue.Current: “Хихи. Хахахаха!”
Monologue.Original: “Hee Haa Haaa Haaaa!”

Monologue.Current: “Не смешно, между прочим!”
Monologue.Original: “It’s not funny you know!”

Monologue.Current: “Хм? Что случилось?”
Monologue.Original: “Hm?{Line} What’s the matter?”

Monologue.Current: “Н-нет... ничего...{Line} Я просто задумалась...”
Monologue.Original: “I...uh...{Line} I was just thinking...”

Monologue.Current: “Ага! Втрескалась в кого-то, точно?”
Monologue.Original: “Are you C-R-A-V-I-N-G{Line} someone? You are, aren’t you!?”

Monologue.Current: “Н-нет! Ничего подобного!”
Monologue.Original: “N...No!{Line} It’s nothing like that!”

Monologue.Current: “Ах, молодость! Пора любви...”
Monologue.Original: “Ahh... To be in love...”

Monologue.Current: “Так, признавайся, кто он?”
Monologue.Original: “So, who’s the guy?{Line} C’mon, tell me!”

Monologue.Current: “Да говорю же, ничего подобного!”
Monologue.Original: “I told you!{Line} It’s not like that!”

Monologue.Current: “Это всё из-за теста на прошлой{Line} неделе. Я почти всё написала, но...”
Monologue.Original: “It’s about last week’s subject.{Line} She almost has it down, but...”

Monologue.Current: “Ну вот! А я уже почти поверила,{Line} что у нашего гения проснулись{Line} человечески чувства!”
Monologue.Original: “Ohhh! I thought it was a little{Line} funny that you were in love.”

Monologue.Current: “Эй! Между прочем, у меня есть па... Ой.”
Monologue.Original: “Heeeeyy!{Line} You don’t know, but I have a bo... Oops.”

Monologue.Current: “А? Что-что-что?!”
Monologue.Original: “Huh!? What? What!?”

Monologue.Current: “Ничего...”
Monologue.Original: “Ohh...nothing...”

Monologue.Current: “Прекрасный бриз. Хороший день{Line} для карточной игры... Сыграем?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Excellent breeze... Great day for cards.{Line} Wanna play me at cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Balamb} rule blow here, too.”
Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Balamb} rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Trabia} rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Centra} rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Dollet} rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Current: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the FH rule blow here, too.”
Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the FH rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Current: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the Lunar rule blow here, too.”
Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the Lunar rule blow here, too.”

Monologue.Current: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Esthar} rule blow here, too.”
Monologue.Original: “I see... So you know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s have the {Term Esthar} rule blow here, too.”
